title: Great Ocean Road Designer Lodges Near Twelve Apostles for Up To Eight Guests
description:
Designed by award-winning architects Glenn Murcutt and Wendy Lewin, this immaculate property features three purpose-built, private contemporary lodges. Each idyllic hillside lodge, nearly identical in layout and amenities, offers four chic bedrooms to comfortably accommodate eight guests. As the closest luxury accommodation to the Twelve Apostles, you'll be wonderfully primed to explore the famous coastal sights of the immaculate Great Ocean Road.

Your lodge will feature exquisite details, including Gaggenau kitchen appliances, high-end European furniture, bespoke wood fireplaces and a remarkable collection of local and international wall art. Built with sustainability in mind, your lodge will utilise passive solar heating and an airy design that allows the Southern Ocean breeze to flow freely, epitomising sophisticated coastal living.
offer_address: 35 Parkers Access Track, Wattle Hill, Victoria 3237, Australia
